no "how was your christmas?" or "what have you been up to?" or "have you pieced your life back together again yet?". bastards.
they've almost gone out of their way to avoid getting to know me at all. they have absolutely no interest in having a friend, just a lodger
so my flatmate got home a little while ago. had a cursory chat, no eye-contact, now shut in her room. this sucks.
i'm designing myself a business card
